amendment.description: To provide the Secretary of Agriculture with the authority to borrow funds from the Treasury to pay for firefighting costs that exceed funds available and to provide funding to conduct hazardous fuels reduction and burned area restoration projects on non-Federal lands in and around communities.

action.text: Amendment SA 2031 ruled out of order by the chair.

Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 2031.

Amendment SA 2031 proposed by Senator Bingaman. (consideration: CR S13601-13605; text: CR S13601) To provide the Secretary of Agriculture with the authority to borrow funds from the Treasury to pay for firefighting costs that exceed funds available and to provide funding to conduct hazardous fuels reduction and burned area restoration projects on non-Federal lands in and around communities.
